com.appnexus.opensdk

Class AdView

  • java.lang.Object
    • FrameLayout
      • com.appnexus.opensdk.AdView
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BannerAdView, InterstitialAdView

    public abstract class AdView
extends FrameLayout
    The parent class of InterstitialAdView and BannerAdView. This can not be instantiated.
    Author:
    jacob

      • loadAd

        public void loadAd(String placementID)
        Loads a new ad, if the ad space is visible, and sets the placement id attribute of the AdView to the supplied parameter.
        Parameters:
        placementID - The new placement id to use.

      • loadAd

        public void loadAd(String placementID,
          int width,
          int height)
        Loads a new ad, if the ad space is visible, and sets the placement id, ad width, and ad height attribute of the AdView to the supplied parameters.
        Parameters:
        placementID - The new placement id to use.
        width - The new width to use.
        height - The new height to use.
